item.title: Table of Contents
item.description: Intro A personal digital garden and hub for all my ramblings and thoughts. This is the index page so that the library is somewhat useful to all of you random internet strangers. A library without an index becomes paradoxically less informative as it grows. – Jorge Luis Borges Notes on articles and books Cognitive Sciences Education and Epistemology Technical Personal Communities and Urban Planning Tech and Society
